-- input.json --
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "import": "app.com/one",
      "type": "*One"
    }
  ],
  "target": "gen/web"
}

-- expect.txt --
&One{Two: &Two{Three: Three{}}}

-- main.go --
package main

import (
  "os"
  "fmt"
  genweb "app.com/gen/web"
)

func main() {
  actual := genweb.Load()
  fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "%s\n", actual)
}

-- go.mod --
module app.com

require (
  mod.test/two v0.0.2
)

-- one/one.go --
package one

import (
  "mod.test/two"
  "fmt"
)

type One struct {
  Two *two.Two
}

func (o *One) String() string {
  return fmt.Sprintf(`&One{Two: %s}`, o.Two)
}
